data.name: Appraisal_Bag_Empty
data.value: Huh?[pause=0] You don't have any items on you.

data.name: Appraisal_Choose
data.value: Choose a box you want me to open. (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Appraisal_Choose_Max
data.value: That many!?[pause=0] Well that'll be {0}!

data.name: Appraisal_Choose_Multi
data.value: I can open all that for {0}.

data.name: Appraisal_Choose_One
data.value: I can open your {1} for {0}.

data.name: Appraisal_End
data.value: All done![pause=0] Check out the goods.

data.name: Appraisal_End_Max_001
data.value: Whew...[pause=30] Now that was a workout!

data.name: Appraisal_End_Max_002
data.value: Now have a look at that loot!

data.name: Appraisal_Goodbye
data.value: Come back with more boxes next time!

data.name: Appraisal_Info_001
data.value: Those boxes you pick up in dungeons... Ever wonder what's inside them?

data.name: Appraisal_Info_002
data.value: They're locked shut.[pause=0] There's no key in the world that can open them.

data.name: Appraisal_Info_003
data.value: But I don't need no key![pause=0] I'll bust right through all of them and give you what's inside!

data.name: Appraisal_Info_004
data.value: Just pay me {0} for each and it's a done deal.

data.name: Appraisal_Intro
data.value: Got any boxes you want me to bust? Only {0} apiece!

data.name: Appraisal_No_Money
data.value: Hey![pause=0] You don't have enough \uE024 for that!

data.name: Appraisal_Option_Open
data.value: Open Boxes

data.name: Appraisal_Return
data.value: Need anything else?

data.name: Appraisal_Start_001
data.value: Wait here.[pause=0] This'll only take a second.

data.name: Appraisal_Start_002
data.value: Stack them all here.[pause=0] I'll handle it no problem!

data.name: Appraisal_Start_Max
data.value: Well cover your ears cause I'm about to get serious!

data.name: Broke_Line_001
data.value: Why,[pause=20] why didn't I visit the storage before going out?[br]I fainted out there with a full inventory...

data.name: Broke_Line_002
data.value: My items...[pause=30] my money...[pause=30] all goooone...

data.name: Catch_Line_001
data.value: Hey Zigzagoon,[pause=20] catch!

data.name: Catch_Line_002
data.value: I got it![pause=0] Back at you,[pause=20] Rattata!

data.name: Catch_Line_003
data.value: Thanks![pause=0] You're way better than the wild Pokemon in Tropical Path.

data.name: Catch_Line_004
data.value: Same![pause=0] When I threw rocks they'd always get hit.[br]And when I threw seeds they always ate them.

data.name: Catch_Line_005
data.value: Yeah,[pause=20] who needs em![pause=0] We can play together!

data.name: Elder_Line_001
data.value: Noctowl's been running the training mazes for as long as I can remember.[br]He's strict sometimes,[pause=20] but he cares about the explorers.

data.name: Father_Line_001
data.value: I was one of the trailblazers when the Guildmasters called upon us to explore this island.[br]With my partner Nidoqueen,[pause=0] we cut paths through the forest and set up camp in the cliffs.[br]But that was a long time ago.[pause=0] We're raising a family now.

data.name: Food_Line_001
data.value: Leaving for an adventure?[pause=0] Be sure to take some food with you!

data.name: Food_Line_002
data.value: You'll get hungry as you explore in Mystery Dungeons.[br]If your belly ever becomes empty, you'll start taking damage.

data.name: Hesitant_Line_001
data.value: The explorer life looks rough.[pause=0] I'm not sure if I could handle it...

data.name: History_Line_001
data.value: One day,[pause=20] the letters were written from this post office and scattered out to the world.[br]No one knows exactly who wrote them,[pause=0] but they all bore the emblem of the legendary explorer's team.[br]They promised a title of ultimate prestige,[pause=0] and marked the highest point of this island's mountains.

data.name: History_Line_002
data.value: But...[pause=20] Is there really anything there?

data.name: Interactive_Line_001
data.value: I love seeing new faces in Base Town![br]It reminds me of the good old days.

data.name: Interactive_Phase_001_Line_001
data.value: Sniff,[pause=20] sniff...[pause=0] You smell like {0}.[br]Did {1} recruit you from there?

data.name: Interactive_Phase_002_Line_001
data.value: {1} recruited you from {0}, didn't they?

data.name: Interactive_Phase_002_Line_002
data.value: Growing up in a Mystery Dungeon sounds rough.[pause=0] Hope you enjoy the town life!

data.name: Interactive_Phase_003_Line_001
data.value: Ah.[pause=30] you must be from {0}.

data.name: Interactive_Phase_003_Line_002
data.value: I got lost there once,[pause=0] I had to call for a rescue.

data.name: Interactive_Phase_004_Line_001
data.value: Is it true you come from {0}?

data.name: Interactive_Phase_004_Line_002
data.value: {0} must be making strides if they've gone that far!

data.name: Interactive_Phase_005_Line_001
data.value: You're from {0}?[pause=0] Never heard of it.

data.name: Interactive_Phase_005_Line_002
data.value: Wait,[pause=30] you're telling me {0} discovered a brand new Mystery Dungeon!?

data.name: Interactive_Trade_Line_001
data.value: I heard you used to be a member of {1}. Do you like your new place in {0}?

data.name: Item_Give_Storage
data.value: The {0} was sent to storage.

data.name: Juice_Intro
data.value: Welcome, this is Shuckle's Juice Stand.

data.name: Locator_Intro
data.value: Welcome to Nosepass Compass, your one and only locator for roaming Pokémon.

data.name: Mother_Line_001
data.value: My partner Nidoking was love at first Apricorn.[br]Whether it's on the battlefield or at home,[pause=20] we'll always be a team.

data.name: Music_End
data.value: Come again \u266A

data.name: Music_Intro
data.value: Greetings, traveler.[pause=0] Fancy a tune for this town?

data.name: Nonbeliever_Line_001
data.value: There's nothing up this mountain![br]Just loose change everyone else dropped in their foolish endeavors![br]Doesn't anyone remember?[br]When Mystery Dungeons appear in great numbers,[pause=0] a world calamity always follows!

data.name: Nonbeliever_Line_002
data.value: The fewer that exist in this world,[pause=20] the better.

data.name: Settling_Line_001
data.value: Exploration teams around the world used to rush to this island to take on the Guildmaster's challenge.[br]The craze died down years ago,[pause=0] but some explorers continue to press on.[br]Especially those folks in the Ravine Camp.

data.name: Shop_Bag_Empty
data.value: Oh?[pause=0] Nothing to sell?

data.name: Shop_Bag_Full
data.value: Oh![pause=0] You have no more space for items!

data.name: Shop_Buy
data.value: Very well![pause=0] Feel free to examine my merchandise! (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Buy_Complete
data.value: Thank you! All yours~

data.name: Shop_Buy_Empty
data.value: I'm sold out.[pause=0] Please forgive me.[pause=0] I will have new merchandise tomorrow!

data.name: Shop_Buy_Multi
data.value: Altogether, that comes to {0}. Is that OK?

data.name: Shop_Buy_No_Money
data.value: What?[pause=0] You don't seem to have the money.

data.name: Shop_Buy_One
data.value: That {1}? That will be {0}.

data.name: Shop_Goodbye
data.value: Thanks! \u266A Please come again \u266A

data.name: Shop_Info_001
data.value: This shop specializes in selling items!

data.name: Shop_Info_002
data.value: Items are useful for your dungeon adventures!

data.name: Shop_Info_003
data.value: Use items with imagination! And invent new uses for them!

data.name: Shop_Info_004
data.value: If the shop sells out,[pause=0] we'll always have new things to sell on the next day!

data.name: Shop_Info_005
data.value: So spend time in dungeons until we restock! Visit us when you return~

data.name: Shop_Intro
data.value: Hello~\u266A \nWelcome to the Kecleon Shop~\u266A

data.name: Shop_Intro_Return
data.value: May I help you with anything else?

data.name: Shop_Option_Buy
data.value: Buy

data.name: Shop_Option_Sell
data.value: Sell

data.name: Shop_Sell
data.value: Very well! What will you sell? (You can use {0} to choose multiple items.)

data.name: Shop_Sell_Complete
data.value: Done deal! Thank you~\u266A

data.name: Shop_Sell_Multi
data.value: I can pay {0} for everything. Is that acceptable?

data.name: Shop_Sell_One
data.value: I can pay {0} for that {1}. Is that acceptable?

data.name: Storehouse_Line_Route
data.value: We're loading up for our next delivery!

data.name: Swap_Choose
data.value: Feel free to look, hehehe...

data.name: Swap_Complete
data.value: Deal![pause=0] Thanks for trading your precious treasure...

data.name: Swap_Complete_Max_001
data.value: YEESSS![pause=0] Come to papa, my precious!

data.name: Swap_Complete_Max_002
data.value: It's mine![pause=0] All mine!![pause=0]\nAahahahaha!

data.name: Swap_Complete_Max_003
data.value: Oh... right,[pause=15] sorry![pause=0] Here's your end of the bargain.

data.name: Swap_Complete_Max_004
data.value: Here you go,[pause=15] your end of the bargain!

data.name: Swap_Confirm_001
data.value: Your {0} for my {1}.

data.name: Swap_Confirm_002
data.value: That'll be {0}, deal?

data.name: Swap_Give
data.value: {0} accepted the {1}!

data.name: Swap_Give_Choose
data.value: A {0}? And what will you give in exchange for it?

data.name: Swap_Goodbye
data.value: Come back soon... Hehehe...

data.name: Swap_Info_001
data.value: You have treasure I want.[pause=0] I have treasure you want.

data.name: Swap_Info_002
data.value: We can help each other.[pause=0] Get the picture?

data.name: Swap_Info_003
data.value: I rotate my selections once every day.[pause=0] Come back often...

data.name: Swap_Intro
data.value: Hehehe... this is Sableye's Treasure Trade. Shall we make a deal?

data.name: Swap_Intro_Return
data.value: Anything else?

data.name: Swap_None
data.value: You![pause=0] Nothing to swap![pause=0] No deals!

data.name: Swap_Option_Swap
data.value: Swap

data.name: Treasure_Line_001
data.value: Money,[pause=30] fame,[pause=30] power...[br]There once was an exploration team that attained all the world could offer.

data.name: Treasure_Line_002
data.value: Before disbanding,[pause=0] they locked their fortunes deep within this island for all to discover.

data.name: Treasure_Line_003
data.value: Or so they say...

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Begin
data.value: Now hold still![pause=0] This won't hurt a bit! Hiyah!

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Success
data.value: Success![pause=0] {0} forgot {1}!

data.name: Tutor_Forget_What
data.value: What move should {0} forget?

data.name: Tutor_Forget_Who
data.value: Who wants to forget a move?

data.name: Tutor_Goodbye
data.value: Come back soon![pause=0] Hiyah!

data.name: Tutor_Info_001
data.value: Forgot a move you needed?[pause=0] I'll show you your moves!

data.name: Tutor_Info_002
data.value: For a small fee, I can help you relearn any move you've learned in the past![br]I can also help you forget a move, for free!

data.name: Tutor_Info_003
data.value: I can help you relearn any move you've learned in the past![br]I can also help you forget a move, if you want.

data.name: Tutor_Info_004
data.value: If you've got some Heart Scales, I can also teach you some special moves.

data.name: Tutor_Intro
data.value: Hiyah![pause=0] Relearn your moves! Only {0}!

data.name: Tutor_Intro_Free
data.value: Hiyah![pause=0] Relearn your moves! It's all on us!

data.name: Tutor_Intro_Return
data.value: Come on! Ready for more?

data.name: Tutor_No_Money
data.value: Hold up! You're short on \uE024!

data.name: Tutor_Now_Free
data.value: [tmp]After clearing guildmaster trail, relearning is now free!

data.name: Tutor_Now_Teaches
data.value: [tmp]After you meet a move tutor in a dungeon, they stopped by in town and shared their secrets![br]I can now teach their moves for heart scales!

data.name: Tutor_Option_Tutor
data.value: Tutor Move

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Begin
data.value: Let's get right to it![pause=0] Hiyah!

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Replace
data.value: We'll need to replace a move![pause=0] What'll it be?

data.name: Tutor_Remember_Success
data.value: Success![pause=0] {0} relearned {1}!

data.value: What move should {0} remember?

data.value: Who wants to remember a move?

data.value: Success![pause=0] {0} learned {1}!

data.name: Tutor_Teach_What
data.value: What move should {0} learn?

data.name: Tutor_Teach_Who
data.value: Who wants to learn a move?

data.name: Mission_Board_Locked
data.value: The Mission Board is only available to those who demonstrate the strength needed to help others.

data.name: Mission_Board_Locked_2
data.value: Complete {0} more dungeons and it will be unlocked for you!

data.name: Outlaw_Capture_Cutscene_001
data.value: Bzz! Thank you for capturing {0} for us! Zzz!

data.name: Outlaw_Capture_Cutscene_002
data.value: Please take this as a reward! Zzz!

data.name: Outlaw_Capture_Cutscene_003
data.value: Please take this as well! Zzz!

data.name: Outlaw_Capture_Cutscene_004
data.value: Thank you for helping to make Guildmaster Island a little bit safer! Zzz!

data.name: Outlaw_Retrieve_Cutscene
data.value: Thank you for getting my {0} back!

data.name: Mission_Generic_Reward
data.value: Please take this as my thanks!

data.name: Mission_Generic_Reward_2
data.value: Please take this as well!

data.name: Mission_Response_Rescue
data.value: Thank you for rescuing my friend!

data.name: Mission_Response_Exploration
data.value: Thank you for taking me on an adventure in {0}!

data.name: Mission_Response_Lost_Item
data.value: Thank you for finding my {0}!

data.name: Mission_Response_Delivery_Item
data.value: Thank you for delivering my {0} the me!

data.name: Mission_Response_Escort
data.value: Thank you for escorting me to my friend!

data.name: Mission_Response_Lover
data.value: Thank you so much for rescuing my love!

data.name: Mission_Response_Rival
data.value: Thank you for rescuing my rival!

data.name: Mission_Response_Child
data.value: Thank you so much for saving my child!

data.value: Your team gained {0} EXP as a reward!
